trends: There have been 9 other sightings in Elgin
There were no other sightings in Elgin on or around November 8th 2013
Summary: Glowing light of red,green,yellow, and blue color, remained stationary behind cloud
divs: Sighting Details1. In parking lot of a high school waiting to pick up sibling from school 2. The sun was shining brighter from the east side and then saw this object come from nowhere 3. Not sure what the object was at first 4. The object showed colors of red,green,yellow,and blue from behind the clouds, it was not moving, just seemed to hover, 5. Confused as to what it might be during the sighting and realized it was a ufo after because it just disappeared and left a hole in the cloud. 6. Lost sight of the object as it disappeared and saw a black helicopter immediately after which came out of nowhere, flying around the same area of the sighting. Also saw an airplane flying in west direction after the ufo was gone
